info.author: Graham Ashton
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Band Saw is a syslog monitoring program desgined to help system administrators
monitor many computers simultaneously. It runs on the desktop, displaying alerts
when important log messages are received.
info.name: Band-Saw
info.summary: Band Saw is a syslog monitoring program for GNOME
info.html_description: Band Saw is a syslog monitoring program desgined to help system administrators monitor many computers simultaneously. It runs on the desktop, displaying alerts when important log messages are received.
